greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Moebius transform of the cototient function A051953.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384 (terms 1 .. 2000 from Harry J. Smith)
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..100000
N. J. A. Sloane, Families of Essentially Identical Sequences, Mar 24 2021 (Includes this sequence)
formula: a(n) = Sum f(n/d)*mu(d), where d divides n and f(x) = x-Phi(x) = A051953(x).
mathematica: Table[DirichletConvolve[MoebiusMu[n], n-EulerPhi[n], n, k], {k, 100}]  (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 24 2018 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 19 2001
ext: OFFSET changed from 0 to 1 by _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 11 2009
